extendedInfo.description: The United Movement app is designed to help students who are part of the United Movement reach their friends for Christ.  This app contains everything you need to grow in your faith and reach those around you.Features:1. Gospel Tract2. Bible3. Journal for Saving Notes and Thoughts4. Complete 20 Lesson Discipleship series5. 31 Day Devotional Study6. Scripture Reference Guide for dealing with life issues7. Bible Reading Plans8. Save Notes Inside Of Discipleship Study And Devotional

reviews.title: No Bible
reviews.comment: Like the overall app, but the bible won\'t come up..
reviews.author: Rick House
